lines.text: I must know the full potential of your invention because my aim is to make an entire army invisible. Do you understand that? An entire army.

[to Ulof]
You're too old-fashioned to be a genius.
There is a man who has unlocked every door, except the one to his own soul...

[Confronted unexpectedly by Ulof trying to open a mysterious locked door in the lab]
Take it easy, Doc! I just came up to see yuh. Thought they had you locked up in here.
Not I... only what's left of my soul.
What kind of idiot are you, Krenner? I can't poke my nose inside a bank door without getting it blown off. Every newspaper in the country's got my picture!
You're bitter, Faust - mean and bitter. You trust no one, and you hate everyone. You're just the man I need and understand.
You're hardly in a position to bargain, Mr. Faust.
A man with a gun doesn't have to bargain.
I did not agree to kill a man by deliberate radiation poisoning.
Imagine what our counter intelligence could accomplish if they were able to become invisible whenever necessary.
The Central Intelligence Agency has already discussed the possibilities with me.
I know what I've been, Joey, but I can change all that. What are you doing?
Giving you your split. You're on your own, Baby!
But you... you said we would be together!
Honey, right now I need a car more than I need you. You can start walking anytime.
But you can't just go off and leave me... Joey?
Goodbye, Laura!
[last lines]
It's a serious problem. What would you do?
